title: Apple iPhone 17 launch event: What to expect - The Verge
description: Apple is getting ready to launch the iPhone 17 during its “Awe dropping” event on September 9th. The company is expected to show off a new iPhone 17 Air, along with the AirPods Pro 3 and Watch Ultra 3.
